definition: in a moment/later/also pr. [dai1 hui3 r5] or [dai1 hui5 r5]
to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: I'll show you a couple of my tricks.
I'm mixing it up with a line of Keats, and I'm going to say something else about Keats.
sentences.chinese: 我把它和济慈的一句诗弄混了，待会儿我再讲济慈。

sentences.english: We could just take a shower right here. There's nobody but us.
sentences.chinese: 我们待会儿只要冲个澡，这里又没别人。

sentences.english: Would you like me to call you back?
sentences.chinese: 您需要让我待会儿再打来吗？

sentences.english: You're welcome. Why don't you ask the conductor when he comes by?
sentences.chinese: 别客气。待会儿列车长过来时，你何不问问他呢？

sentences.english: I check-in online so I don’t have to stand in the queue later.
sentences.chinese: 我通过网络进行了登记，待会儿就不必去排长队。

sentences.english: Well, after awhile, “later” creates piles and messes.
sentences.chinese: 然后，“待会儿”制造出成堆的混乱。

sentences.english: Are you going to the class meeting later?
I am a little a bit busy right now,can we talk later?
sentences.chinese: 我现在比较忙，可不可以待会儿再谈？

sentences.english: I hadn't eaten at all that day because I had to get my blood sugar tested.
sentences.chinese: 因为待会儿要测血糖，所以我没吃饭。

sentences.english: OK, I am late.See you later.
sentences.chinese: 好的，我要迟到了，待会儿见。

sentences.english: Permit me to be infantile by myself.
sentences.chinese: 让我一个人幼稚的待会儿。

sentences.english: I am a little bit busy right now, can we talk later?
sentences.chinese: 现在我比较忙，可不可以待会儿再谈？

sentences.english: We’ll just go get them before I take you to the bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 现在咱们就去拿礼物吧，待会儿我再送你们去车站。

sentences.english: "Anyway, I'll see you later, " says Joel.
sentences.chinese: 哎，我还是待会儿再见你吧。

definition: erhua variant of 等一會|等一会[deng3 yi1 hui4]
another day/some other time/to find another day (for appointment etc)/to take a rain check
you all (archaic)/see also 你們|你们[ni3 men5]
to avoid/so as to save (money or time)
so as not to/so as to avoid
erhua variant of 快點|快点[kuai4 dian3]
